verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w*, \w an|strong="G2532"\w* \w Apostle|strong="G0652"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w by|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* order \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* Saviour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*;

\w To|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w*, \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w true|strong="G1103"\w* \w child|strong="G5043"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*: \w Grace|strong="G5485"\w*, \w mercy|strong="G1656"\w*, \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2316"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*.

\w It|strong="G1519"\w* \w was|strong="G4771"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* desire, \w when|strong="G1722"\w* \w I|strong="G1722"\w* \w went|strong="G4198"\w* \w on|strong="G1722"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w Macedonia|strong="G3109"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w might|strong="G5100"\w* \w make|strong="G3361"\w* \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w stop|strong="G3361"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Ephesus|strong="G2181"\w*, \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w give|strong="G3853"\w* \w orders|strong="G3853"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w certain|strong="G5100"\w* \w men|strong="G5100"\w* \w not|strong="G3361"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* put forward \w a|strong="G1722"\w* \w different|strong="G2085"\w* teaching,

\w Or|strong="G2228"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w give|strong="G3930"\w* \w attention|strong="G4337"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* stories \w and|strong="G2532"\w* long lists \w of|strong="G2316"\w* generations, \w from|strong="G2228"\w* \w which|strong="G3748"\w* come questionings \w and|strong="G2532"\w* doubts, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w place|strong="G1722"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* God's ordered \w way|strong="G1722"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* life \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2316"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* effect \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* order \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* coming \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* \w clean|strong="G2513"\w* \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w what|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* right, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* true \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w From|strong="G5100"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w have|strong="G5100"\w* \w been|strong="G5100"\w* \w turned|strong="G1624"\w* away, giving \w themselves|strong="G1519"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* foolish talking;

\w Desiring|strong="G2309"\w* \w to|strong="G3004"\w* \w be|strong="G1510"\w* \w teachers|strong="G3547"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3739"\w* \w law|strong="G3547"\w*, though \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w no|strong="G3361"\w* knowledge \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w say|strong="G3004"\w* \w or|strong="G3383"\w* \w of|strong="G4012"\w* \w the|strong="G3739"\w* statements \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w make|strong="G1226"\w* \w so|strong="G3361"\w* certainly.

\w We|strong="G1437"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* conscious \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G5100"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w*, \w if|strong="G1437"\w* \w a|strong="G1437"\w* \w man|strong="G5100"\w* makes \w a|strong="G1437"\w* \w right|strong="G2570"\w* \w use|strong="G5530"\w* \w of|strong="G3551"\w* \w it|strong="G0846"\w*,

\w With|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* knowledge \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w is|strong="G3778"\w* \w made|strong="G2749"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w upright|strong="G1342"\w* \w man|strong="G3778"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* respect \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w law|strong="G3551"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* order, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* evil \w men|strong="G3778"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w the|strong="G2532"\w* \w unholy|strong="G0462"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w who|strong="G3748"\w* \w have|strong="G2532"\w* \w no|strong="G3756"\w* religion, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w those|strong="G3778"\w* \w who|strong="G3748"\w* put \w their|strong="G2532"\w* fathers \w or|strong="G2532"\w* \w mothers|strong="G3389"\w* \w to|strong="G2532"\w* death, \w for|strong="G3754"\w* takers \w of|strong="G3551"\w* life,

\w For|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* go \w after|strong="G2532"\w* loose women, \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w with|strong="G2532"\w* unnatural desires, \w for|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* take \w men|strong="G5100"\w* prisoners, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* make false statements \w and|strong="G2532"\w* false oaths, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w do|strong="G2532"\w* \w any|strong="G5100"\w* \w other|strong="G2087"\w* \w things|strong="G5100"\w* against \w the|strong="G3588"\w* right \w teaching|strong="G1319"\w*,

\w Which|strong="G3739"\w* \w may|strong="G2316"\w* \w be|strong="G2316"\w* seen \w in|strong="G2596"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G2098"\w* \w news|strong="G2098"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w of|strong="G2316"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* great \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w was|strong="G3739"\w* given \w into|strong="G2316"\w* \w my|strong="G3739"\w* care.

\w I|strong="G1473"\w* give praise \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G2424"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* gave \w me|strong="G1473"\w* power, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w he|strong="G3754"\w* took \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w be|strong="G5547"\w* true, making \w me|strong="G1473"\w* \w his|strong="G2192"\w* servant,

\w Though|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w had|strong="G1510"\w* \w said|strong="G2532"\w* \w violent|strong="G5197"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G1722"\w* \w God|strong="G1653"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w done|strong="G4160"\w* cruel \w acts|strong="G4160"\w*, \w causing|strong="G4160"\w* great trouble: \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w was|strong="G1510"\w* given \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w because|strong="G3754"\w* \w I|strong="G2532"\w* \w did|strong="G4160"\w* \w it|strong="G4160"\w* \w without|strong="G2532"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G0050"\w*, \w not|strong="G1510"\w* \w having|strong="G4160"\w* faith;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w our|strong="G2424"\w* \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* \w very|strong="G2532"\w* great, \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w is|strong="G2962"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w*.

\w It|strong="G3739"\w* \w is|strong="G1510"\w* \w a|strong="G1510"\w* true \w saying|strong="G3056"\w*, \w in|strong="G1519"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* put \w their|strong="G2532"\w* \w faith|strong="G3739"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w came|strong="G2064"\w* \w into|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* \w world|strong="G2889"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w give|strong="G2064"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4982"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w sinners|strong="G0268"\w*, \w of|strong="G3056"\w* \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w am|strong="G1510"\w* \w the|strong="G3956"\w* chief:

\w But|strong="G0235"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w this|strong="G3778"\w* \w reason|strong="G1223"\w* \w I|strong="G1473"\w* \w was|strong="G2424"\w* given \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1473"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* chief \w of|strong="G1223"\w* sinners, \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w might|strong="G5547"\w* make clear \w all|strong="G0537"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w mercy|strong="G1653"\w*, \w as|strong="G1519"\w* an \w example|strong="G5296"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w future|strong="G3195"\w* \w would|strong="G3195"\w* \w have|strong="G1653"\w* \w faith|strong="G4100"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0166"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*.

\w Now|strong="G1161"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w King|strong="G0935"\w* \w eternal|strong="G0165"\w*, ever-living, \w unseen|strong="G0517"\w*, \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w only|strong="G3441"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*, \w be|strong="G2532"\w* honour \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*. \w So|strong="G2532"\w* \w be|strong="G2532"\w* \w it|strong="G1161"\w*.

\w This|strong="G3778"\w* \w order|strong="G2443"\w* \w I|strong="G3778"\w* give \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w Timothy|strong="G5095"\w* \w my|strong="G1722"\w* \w son|strong="G5043"\w*, \w in|strong="G1722"\w* harmony \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* words \w of|strong="G1909"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* prophets \w about|strong="G1909"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w by|strong="G1722"\w* \w them|strong="G0846"\w* \w you|strong="G4771"\w* \w may|strong="G2443"\w* \w be|strong="G5043"\w* strong, fighting \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w good|strong="G2570"\w* \w fight|strong="G4752"\w*,

\w Keeping|strong="G2192"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w being|strong="G2192"\w* conscious \w of|strong="G5100"\w* well-doing; \w for|strong="G4012"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w*, \w by|strong="G2532"\w* \w not|strong="G3739"\w* doing \w these|strong="G3739"\w* \w things|strong="G3739"\w*, \w have|strong="G2192"\w* gone wrong \w in|strong="G2532"\w* relation \w to|strong="G2532"\w* \w the|strong="G3588"\w* \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*:

\w Such|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1510"\w* \w Hymenaeus|strong="G5211"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Alexander|strong="G0223"\w*, \w whom|strong="G3739"\w* \w I|strong="G3739"\w* \w have|strong="G1510"\w* \w given|strong="G3860"\w* \w up|strong="G3860"\w* \w to|strong="G2443"\w* \w Satan|strong="G4567"\w*, \w so|strong="G2443"\w* \w that|strong="G3739"\w* \w they|strong="G3739"\w* \w may|strong="G2532"\w* say \w no|strong="G3361"\w* more \w evil|strong="G0987"\w* \w words|strong="G2532"\w* \w against|strong="G0987"\w* God.
